description: This file defines REST API endpoints related to authentication, including signup and login, using FastAPI. It manages user creation and credential verification, returning JWT tokens.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents user data model, including email, password hash, full name, and activity status.

methods.name: TokenResponse signup(payload: SignupRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Registers a new user and returns a JWT token upon success.

methods.name: TokenResponse login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token if credentials are valid.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/

ctags.name: signup
ctags.pattern: /^def signup(payload: SignupRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/
